title: Rangers Legends v Liverpool Legends: Live score and updates as Gerrard features
text:
Follow all the action as it happens right here with Sportsmail's James Ayles

Rangers manager Steven Gerrard will wear a Liverpool shirt again as a Reds Legends side face a Rangers Legends outfit at Ibrox on Saturday afternoon.

The former midfielder will line up alongside the likes of Luis Garcia, Dirk Kuyt and Jamie Carragher.

Gerrard is also set to feature for the Gers in the all-star charity clash which kicks off at 3pm.

Follow all the action as it happens right here with SPORTSMAIL'S JAMES AYLES.

CLICK HERE TO VIEW THIS LIVE BLOG ON MOBILE
description: Rangers manager Steven Gerrard will wear a Liverpool shirt again in the all-star charity clash. Follow all the action as it happens right here with SPORTSMAIL'S JAMES AYLES .
